question.text: Why should you allow extra room when overtaking a motorcyclist on a windy day?

explanation.text: If you’re driving in high winds, be aware that the conditions might force a motorcyclist or cyclist to swerve or wobble. Take this into consideration if you’re following or wish to overtake a two-wheeled vehicle.

answer.text: The rider may turn off suddenly to get out of the wind
The rider may be blown across in front of you
The rider may be travelling faster than normal
